SLIMFinderR 0.1.0
  • Reference

Reference

All functions

ELMdb2GRanges()

Download and read ELM database motif occurrences

GRangesINinteractionSubsetFASTA()

Check if proteins in GRanges were used for motif search using QSLIMFinder (SLIMFinder)

PPInetwork2SLIMFinder()

Find linear motifs (QSLIMFinder or SLIMFinder) in the protein interaction network

QSLIMFinderCommand() mQSLIMFinderCommand() groupQSLIMFinderCommand()

Generate a QSLIMFinder command

SLIMFinderOcc2GRanges()

Read QSLIMFinder (SLIMFinder) occurence output to Genomic Ranges object

benchmarkMotifs() queryOCCByMCOL() mBenchmarkMotifs()

Benchmark linear motif instance found using QSLIMFinder (SLIMFinder)

benchmarkMotifsROC() mBenchmarkMotifsROC()

Plot ROC or precision-recall curves for motifs search benchmark

centerDomains()

Center QSLIMFinder datasets (InteractionSubsetFASTA_list) at domains

domainProteinPairMatch()

Check if the protein in the set2 is associated with domain that is contained in the protein in the name and remove if not

filterBYmotifType()

Filter ELM database motif occurrence GRanges by motif type

filterInteractionSubsetFASTA_list()

Filter InteractionSubsetFASTA_list by the size of the interaction sets (number of proteins in each)

findOverlapsBench()

Find occuring GRanges overlapping with the benchmarking set (positive + negative examples)

interactionSubsetFASTA()

FASTA sequences of interactors of a specific protein

interactionSubsetMapID()

interaction_subset_from_2_sets renames ids in the interaction_subset_from_2_sets object

listInteractionSubsetFASTA()

get FASTA sequences of proteins that interact with seed proteins (datasets for QSLIMFinder)

listSingleInteractFromSet2()

Split interaction subset from 2 sets so that each elements contains only one of the proteins from set 2, and retrieve FASTA sequences for each

merge2GRangesmcols()

Merge data.table to GRanges metadata

motifVariantClass()

Generate motif variant class (the first 2 element in the motif names)

plotEnrichment()

Plot the enrichment of domains that are likely to be mediating interactions in domain annotated by ELM as mediating linear motif mediated interactions

printMotifDomainTable()

printMotifDomainTable combines Domain enrichment and Motif search results

randomGRanges()

Generate random GRanges of equal length in the same sequence

readQSLIMFinderMain() readQSLIMFinderOccurence() writePatternList()

Read and write QSLIMFinder results

recodeANDinteractionSubsetFASTA()

Recode names and retrieve FASTA sequences of interactors of a specific protein

recodeFASTA()

Recode names of the AAStringSet object

reduceOverlappingGRanges()

Reduce Overlapping GRanges keeping metadata (collapsing withing each column separated by pipes)

reduceWithMcols()

Reduce GRanges keeping metadata (collapsing withing each column separated by pipes)

runCompariMotif3()

Run CompariMotif3

runQSLIMFinder() modifyMemoryInBsub() LSFrunQSLIMFinder() jobsCrashed()

Run a list of QSLIMFinder jobs

singleInteractFromSet2()

Filter interaction subset from 2 sets: keep only i-th element from the set2

subset2setsBy1ID()

Subset 2 sets of protein interaction data using a single ID and combine the results

writeInteractionSubsetFASTA_list()

Write InteractionSubsetFASTA_list into directory system (creating directories as necessary) and return file locations for QSLIMFinder

  • All functions
